cards.title: Skidmark
setup: Put {SkidmarkCharacter} into play, 'Superpowered Drug Lord' side up. Shuffle all Thug cards and put them face down under this one as the Thug deck.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if the Thug deck is empty, the Merchants have grown out of control. [b]GAME OVER.[/b]
At the end of the villain turn, play the top {H - 1} cards of the Thug deck.
When {SkidmarkCharacter} would be destroyed, flip {SkidmarkCharacter}'s villain character cards instead.
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
flippedGameplay: [b]The heroes cannot win the game as long as there is a villain target in play.[/b]
At the start of the villain turn, if the Thug deck is empty, the Merchants have grown out of control. [b]GAME OVER.[/b]
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the Thug deck.

cards.title: Festival of Blood
body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: You piss-licking losers know what the{BR}red armband means! Bloodshed! Violence!{BR}We've got ourselves a free for all brawl!

cards.title: Festival of Excess
body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Green armband means poison,{BR}and this is a poison half of you wastes{BR}of air have already tasted! We're gonna{BR}make it as bad as it gets! The worst of{BR}bad trips!

cards.title: Festival of Love
body: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Thug deck.
cards.flavorText: They smiled as they posed provocatively{BR}and hugged the mannequins, showing off{BR}the clothes.

cards.title: Helicopter
body: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the Thug deck.
cards.flavorText: Squealer's vehicle was like a{BR}helicopter made by someone who had{BR}never seen a helicopter before, who'd{BR}decided to add their own improvements.

cards.title: Mush
body: This card is immune to melee and projectile damage.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 1 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: His other arm and much of his lower{BR}body had already gathered some garbage{BR}around it, letting him stand several feet{BR}taller than he had before.

cards.title: Not Exactly Sanitary
body: Whenever a villain target deals non-toxic damage to another target, that villain target also deals that target 1 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: One man helped by a kid who might{BR}have been his son upended a trash can on{BR}the glowing ground to send rotted food{BR}and other rubbish flying into the ring.

cards.title: Reveller
body: When this card would be put into the villain trash or villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Countless Merchants had{BR}gathered, some perching on piles{BR}of trash or rubble as lookouts, and it{BR}seemed like everyone was striving to be{BR}heard over the music.

cards.title: Sadist
body: When this card would be put into the villain trash or villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: A man who stood outside the{BR}ring grabbed a piece of rubble and{BR}threw it, striking a man who was crouching{BR}and trying to avoid the{BR}worst of the fighting.

cards.title: Scrub
body: At the start of the villain turn, this card deals 5 energy damage to each target other than itself whose HP is evenly divisible by 3.
cards.flavorText: White smoke poured from{BR}his eyes, nose, ears and mouth, with{BR}smaller traces flowing from his scalp,{BR}stirring his hair.

cards.title: Squealer
body: Environment cards ignore villain targets when dealing damage.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Squealer had apparently never{BR}grasped the concept of elegance in{BR}design. She went for size, augmentations{BR}and additions when she built her vehicles.

cards.title: Tough
body: When this card would be put into the villain trash or villain deck, shuffle it into the Thug deck instead.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: One of the Merchants in the ring had{BR}just bludgeoned someone with a length{BR}of pipe.
